author: Scott Caine
comment: I was expecting this app to set a shortcut to the active screen/app so that I could swipe it open whenever I wanted. Instead it is used to keep open whatever app you have in the foreground, even if the screen goes off so it loads up straight away. Useful when you want to save battery and not have to load up the same app time after time but if you could turn the swipe gesture into a sort of favourite shortcut launcher it would be great. The app design otherwise is very neat and good looking.
title: Does what it's designed for but could be improved

author: Bob Peplinski
comment: Awesome work. I'm been looking for this app since I got my Moto 360. It works great for the example of grocery store and always checking your list. I use it when I golf so my rangefinder apps are right there at the front and I don't have to manually get back into the app.
title: Works great! Thanks!

author: Chung Nguyen
comment: Tried to pin the golf shot app during rounds of golf but it does not work. Screen keeps going back to its default screen after 15 seconds.
title: does not work

author: Robert
comment: Great concept, doesn't allow to pin Google music control, says 'no app' when trying to pin.
title: Not working 360 Gen 2 42MM

comment: i have tons of apps on my watch. But this is the only one of its kind app i found on play store. Intelligently executed. Must have.
title: Most useful app

author: Tyagi Rangappa
comment: This is exactly what I have been looking for.
title: Awesome app for Android wear

author: Paul Jennings
title: Excellent ! Cannot believe this is not a native feature !

author: Kenneth Colwell
comment: This is just what is needed to make apps like keep useful. Great job!
title: Awesome

author: Chon Wang
comment: This is a great idea, and works great!

author: harry glenn mercado
comment: is it possible to add an active area oriented on the left/right upper most of the lg g watch r? so that it will not interfere with dedicated swipe control of the watch which is located in the middle side part of the watch. thank you very much.

reply.author: TRIGONE
reply.content: I will check if I can make something efficient to have more possible active areas for round watches.

title: great app!

author: Dennis Bareis
comment: The app also doesn't work when "theater mode"  is on.  I'd want a launcher app that can pin apps as required.

reply.author: TRIGONE
reply.content: I'm not sure to well understand your issue with the app. Please could you send us an email with more detail on what goes wrong? Thank you.

title: It pins apps but doesn't help to launching them

author: Alexey Akimov
comment: Perfect for details view in fitness trackers like runtastic. Donated some to support development - good job.
title: Thanks

reply.author: TRIGONE
reply.content: Please could you contact us by email to see why it doesn't work with you?

author: Austin Kathol
comment: Thanks! Google Keep + a grocery list is the awesome use case, but will probably come in handy for other tasks. Thanks for adding the missing functionality! Donating!

reply.author: TRIGONE
reply.content: Thank you for your donation, it's greatly appreciated.

title: Great

comment: Exactly what I needed to pin Keep for my shopping list. Simple, works great.
title: Perfect

author: Timothy Strunk
comment: Great job!  This is functionality that is definitely needed in android wear!  Works just as promised.
title: Fantastic!

author: Derek Wyman
comment: Very useful and well thought out app.
title: works as advertised

author: Dinico Win
comment: As advertised.. Could use some settings tho. In a nice, clean, material design. 😤
title: It works
